# Changes in version 1.1.2.9000-1 (2025-12-12)

## New functions

## Removed functions and deprecations

## Bugfixes and changes

### `read_XSYG2R()`

- Attributes from the record level are now all included in the `@info`
  slot, as long as they do not duplicate the attributes from the curve
  level. Hence, those attributes are now available for filtering
  (#1239).
